reviewText: If  you  do any research about this author you will most likely have  done more research than the author has  done on any of his topics that  he has "published". The product descriptions  are obviously  generic descriptions about the topic and in  no way describe what is in his  videos. His dvds and publications are in the thousands.  Please read other  reviews  before you  buy. They are all bad. If anyone from Amazon has  actually looked into his  products I'm  sure they would not be offered through this company.
